messages.subject: 28mm 13th Century Samurai miniatures for wargamers
messages.msgSnippet: I have added 28mm 13th Century Horse Archers to the Wargames Factory pre-order list: http://www.wargamesfactory.com/league_fareast 28mm Foot samurai and
messages.messageBody:
I have added 28mm 13th Century Horse Archers to the Wargames Factory
pre-order list:
http://www.wargamesfactory.com/league_fareast

28mm Foot samurai and followers will be available to pre-order soon as
well.

I have also suggested 15mm Ikko-Ikki miniatures.

Thanks for any support and input!

Kenshin
